before.title: Monitor Weather Updates
before.description: Track IMD bulletins and NDMA alerts regularly
steps: Check IMD website every 2 hours during cyclone season
Subscribe to SMS alerts from local authorities

before.title: Secure Your Home
before.description: Prepare your house for high winds and heavy rain
steps: Install storm shutters or board up windows
Trim tree branches near the house

before.title: Emergency Kit Preparation
steps: Water: 4 liters per person per day

during.title: Stay Indoors
during.description: Remain inside until authorities declare it safe
steps: Stay away from windows and glass doors
Move to the strongest part of the building
Listen to battery-powered radio for updates

during.title: Flood Precautions
during.description: Protect yourself from storm surge and flooding
steps: Move to higher floors if flooding occurs
Stay away from electrical equipment if wet
Do not drive through flooded roads

after.title: Damage Assessment
steps: Wait for official all-clear before going outside
Check for gas leaks and electrical damage

after.title: Community Support
steps: Share resources with those in need
